meta.name: Reply Chain
meta.tagline: Shows a list of replies when following reply chains.

showWithTwo.description: The minimum length of the reply chain before showing the list: enabled for `2` (meaning clicking on any reply will show it), disabled for `3` (meaning you need to click on two chained to show it).

whitelist.description: A list of channel IDs in which the plugin is active. If empty, this option is ignored, and the plugin is enabled everywhere.
